text: John Harron (March 31, 1903 â€“ November 24, 1939) was an American actor. He was born in New York City. He died in Seattle, Washington from spinal meningitis when he was 36 years old. He appeared in 167 movies between 1918 and 1940. ==Personal life== Harron married an actress called Betty Westmore in 1929. They had one child. title: John Harron
